data.eml:eml: A review of Gonothrombium Feider, 1950 (Actinotrichida: Microtrombidiidae) with description of a new species from Turkey

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Karakurt, İbrahim, Sevsay, Sevgi, Buğa, Evren (2016): A review of Gonothrombium Feider, 1950 (Actinotrichida: Microtrombidiidae) with description of a new species from Turkey. Zootaxa 4154 (1): 51-65, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4154.1.3
